Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0325703/","name":"Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzYxOTgxYjAtNGI3MS00NDJkLTkyZWItZGM5MzRhOGYwYjlmL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0325703/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"johnnysugar","dateCreated":"2003-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best James Bond Film In Five Years!","reviewBody":"Let's face it, the James Bond franchise has become rather limp lately. "The World Is Not Enough" was a debacle of miscasting and an an endless parade of meaningless subplots and tertiary characters. "Die Another Day" suffered from much of the same, but was also saddled with an inexplicable amount of stereo feedback and one of the oddest (if catchiest) theme songs in recent memory. The series has been re-energized with the new entry "The Cradle Of Life," a high-spirited, far-reaching film that doesn't quite succeed but is such an improvement on the originals that you're ready to overlook all that.

Actually, this is a review of "Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life", the sequel to 2001's abysmally dull video-game-based film "Tomb Raider." Angelina Jolie is back as sexy, gun-toting archeologist Lara Croft, and at first glance, it's easy to mistake her for Bond, Jane Bond. Lara is a British citizen of refined taste, highly competent in various forms of weaponry, travels around the globe to exotic locations, has friends (and lovers) in virtually every port, uses a wide variety of nifty gadgets, has an amusing yet dry form of wit, looks fabulous, and routinely saves the world from a madman bent on global domination. She's a better 007 than Timothy Dalton in any case.

The film begins with Lara diving into a sunken temple off the coast of Greece. While there, she is attacked by Chinese mercenaries, her support crew killed and left for dead, the mercenaries making off with a mysterious glowing orb. Seems that mad scientist Jonathan Reiss (Ciaran Hinds) is looking for Pandora's Box, and the orb is the key to finding it. Lara is appointed by MI:6 with stopping Reiss because opening the box would unleash an amazingly nasty plague upon the world. Besides her support staff of Hillary (Chris Barrie) and computer expert Bryce (Noah Taylor), Lara joins forces with ex-lover Terry Sheridan (Gerard Butler), a shifty mercenary and the only person who knows how to get to the mercenaries who stole the orb in the first place. And of course, time is running out.

Jolie is excellent as Lara Croft, and there probably isn't an actress around who would be better cast in the role. Jolie has the physicality, the look, the voice, and the attitude to pull off the role effortlessly. She was the only redeeming factor in the first film, and she's great to watch here. The supporting cast is a mixed bag. Hinds refrains from chewing up too much of the scenery, but he brings to mind some of the more notable Bond villains of recent times. Butler is great to look at, but his performance is far too low-key and deadpan for a movie as bombastic as this one wants to be, especially when he's paired with Jolie, who enters each seen with a relishing look in her eyes. Taylor again acts as a dry kind of comic relief, and he displays far more chemistry with Jolie than Butler does.

One of the biggest improvements in this film is the director. Replacing Simon West (responsible for the monotonous "Con Air") is Jan de Bont ("Speed"), a much more competent director even if some of his films are only barley entertaining ("The Haunting"). de Bont has a knack for action on a small scale, most vividly in a gun-fight staged in a laboratory/office, but his large scale pieces, like Lara body-gliding off of one of Hong Kong's tallest buildings, lack drama. Still, de Bont has chosen good locations and sets for the film, and there is a blessedly welcome lack of the "Matrix"-style visuals and candy-colored bombast so popular in action films of recent memory. He is nothing if not up to task. The film operates well within its own set of rules and physics, unlike many other films that tend to sacrifice internal logic for cheap stunts.

As much of an improvement on the first film as this is, there are still flaws. The script, while improving ten-fold on the original, still falls flat on several occasions, sometimes held up only by Jolie's confident line readings. At almost two hours, the film displays a desperate need for tighter scenes and a quicker pace while simultaneously leaving some scenes cut too quickly. The movie can be very easily divided into stages, which may hold true to the spirit of the video game's levels, but often leaves the audience doing nothing more than predicting when the DVD chapter cuts will occur in six months. Also, like the James Bond films, there is rarely any doubt that Lara will escape any dire situation she finds herself in. Like 007, we always know the hero will prevail in the end, which robs some scenes of the tension needed to excite the audience.

Despite some of these flaws, "The Cradle Of Life" is a fine movie and a good way to spend 2 hours on a summer afternoon. Jolie obviously enjoys the role, and if nothing else, the film is worth it for that alone. Here's hoping the third entry into the series is even better than the this one. 7 out of 10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":135160,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2003-09-24","keywords":"archeologist,based on video game,sequel,altered version of studio logo,eight word title","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lara Croft Tomb Raider Two: The Cradle of Life","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi143786265","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg5YWJlNjMtNzNjNC00YjZmLWEwMDQtNDBhMmZjYWRmMjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg5YWJlNjMtNzNjNC00YjZmLWEwMDQtNDBhMmZjYWRmMjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057368/","name":"Chris Barrie"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000957/","name":"Jan de Bont"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007500/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1212988/","name":"Dean Georgaris","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0211823/","name":"Steven E. de Souza","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366337/","name":"James V. programme.title: Sky High
Gimnazija za superjunake
programme.desc:
Sky High: Directed by Mike Mitchell. With Michael Angarano, Kurt Russell, Kelly Preston, Danielle Panabaker. Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0405325/","name":"Sky High","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA2NmY1OTQtMjE4Mi00NGRkLWFmODUtM2Q3ZTRlYjZhNWYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0405325/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thisisshe"},"dateCreated":"2005-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great idea carried out well","reviewBody":"Kurt Russell went back to his Disney roots with Sky High, a fresh take on the superhero craze. The story revolves around Will Stronghold( Michael Angarano) who is the kid of two superhero parents, The Commander( Kurt Russell) and Jetstream( Kelly Preston). Will is off to be a freshman at his dad's alma mater- Sky High, a school for superheroes where they can find their powers and learn how to use them. High school angst is then thrown into the mix as Will and his new group of friends, headed up by the typical girl best friend Layla( Danielle Panabaker), are told they don't fit the superhero mold and become sidekicks, otherwise known as the losers of the school. 

I loved the idea of this movie and the people in it seemed to be having a great time. The roles were cast perfectly and it was easy to believe everyone. A few favorites were Warren Peace( Steven Strait), Layla and Zach( Nicholas Braun). Sure the plot was a tad predictable, both in the superhero plot and in the teen drama area but because of the setting and the mix it made it still worth seeing. Also, anything that has Bruce Campbell, who plays Coach Boomer, is automatically quirky enough to be given a chance. Of course the world ends up in danger and the underdogs must fight to save it, but for once I wasn't upset that I knew it all.

Disney needed a hit as the past few movies it's put out that were live action failed to do much. I think Sky High is it. Action for the boys, cute boys and drama for the girls and Kurt Russell for the moms- great family movie. All I can end with is I can't wait for it to come out on video.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2005-07-29","keywords":"coming of age,non comic book superhero,superheroine,teen movie,male protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sky High","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2730492185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRlN2U5MDMtNjUzYy00YTUwLTg4NDItN2FhYjRiNzZlNzUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRlN2U5MDMtNjUzYy00YTUwLTg4NDItN2FhYjRiNzZlNzUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #1 Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000621/","name":"Kurt Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000593/","name":"Kelly Preston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0029400/","name":"Michael Angarano"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007784/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0134201/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1467549/","name":"Paul Hernandez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0774792/","name":"Bob Schooley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566407/","name":"Mark McCorkle"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Saint
Svetac
programme.desc: The Saint: Directed by Phillip Noyce. With Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue, Rade Serbedzija, Valeriy Nikolaev. Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120053/","name":"The Saint","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmM3MjI2YjUtYjk1MS00M2VjLWI4MmUtM2UyYWQyNTVlZGE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120053/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcobbimdb"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly surprised","reviewBody":"Maybe my expectations were too low going in after reading a slue of terrible reviews, but I thought it was a good solid movie and very entertaining. Val Kilmer was great in his disguises and rolls. Elisabeth Shue was attractive as ever and played her part well. The movie kept on a continual pace, and kept the action and suspense throughout. There were a few things I thought were lame and it got a little unrealistic at times, but all in all it was a good solid movie. Maybe even a good action / romance date movie. If you haven't seen it (as I hadn't until today), give it a try. It has action, suspense, romance, and a little comedy thrown in for good measure. It runs in at just about 2 hours long, so long enough to get a good plot, some twists & turns and yet not bore you. There will always be people that pick plot holes in movies and just love proving that it's road kill. If you're one of those people, maybe you should stay away, but if you want a good entertaining popcorn movie it's worth a watch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65876,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"1997-04-04","keywords":"cold fusion,knights templar,russophobia,propaganda,cranberry","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000174/","name":"Val Kilmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000223/","name":"Elisabeth Shue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0784884/","name":"Rade Serbedzija"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030480/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026101/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0153546/","name":"Leslie Charteris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378144/","name":"Jonathan Hensleigh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0834338/","name":"Wesley Strick"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Idiocracy
Idioti budućnosti
programme.desc:
Idiocracy: Directed by Mike Judge. With Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard, Terry Crews. Private Joe Bauers, a decisively average American, is selected as a guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program but is forgotten, awakening to a future so incredibly moronic he's easily the most intelligent person alive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0387808/","name":"Idiocracy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ4MzI2ZDQtYjk3MS00ODdjLTkwN2QtOTBjYzIwM2RmNzgyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Private Joe Bauers, a decisively average American, is selected as a guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program but is forgotten, awakening to a future so incredibly moronic he's easily the most intelligent person alive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0387808/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Eschete"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Only in America","reviewBody":"Cinematic flaws? Yes. But I don't want to be too long-winded, because I don't want to cushion the shock of what I'm about to say.

You know how stupid the people in this movie looked to you? How dumb, trashy, shallow? That's what America is looking like to a LOT of the rest of the world these days. Think about it.

I think this movie should be shown in HISTORY classes when discussing the downfalls of long-lived empires (or nations). Maybe then we might get a little cold fear in our bellies, fear of ending up with a wrestler (or bodybuilder) President who can barely speak English. Or fear that the dimwit with ten kids in front of you in line at the grocery store is raising the Senators of tomorrow.

Mike Judge is a prophet. I just wish Fox had backed him up more.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":153736,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2007-01-25","keywords":"political comedy,stupidity,time traveler,hibernation,american president","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Idiocracy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1622016281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY4MzE1ZGMtOWIyNC00NDY5LTg1MTUtMjdlM2Y4NzcwNDNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY4MzE1ZGMtOWIyNC00NDY5LTg1MTUtMjdlM2Y4NzcwNDNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005561/","name":"Luke Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0748973/","name":"Maya Rudolph"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1009277/","name":"Dax Shepard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431918/","name":"Mike Judge"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274496/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431918/","name":"Mike Judge"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1000113/","name":"Etan Cohen"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0387808, Title: Idiocracy, --- Description: Idiocracy: Directed by Mike Judge. With Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard, Terry Crews. Private Joe Bauers, a decisively average American, is selected as a guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program but is forgotten, awakening to a future so incredibly moronic he's easily the most intelligent person alive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0387808/","name":"Idiocracy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ4MzI2ZDQtYjk3MS00ODdjLTkwN2QtOTBjYzIwM2RmNzgyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Private Joe Bauers, a decisively average American, is selected as a guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program but is forgotten, awakening to a future so incredibly moronic he's easily the most intelligent person alive.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0387808/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Eschete","dateCreated":"2007-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Only in America","reviewBody":"Cinematic flaws? Yes. But I don't want to be too long-winded, because I don't want to cushion the shock of what I'm about to say.

You know how stupid the people in this movie looked to you? How dumb, trashy, shallow? That's what America is looking like to a LOT of the rest of the world these days. Think about it.

I think this movie should be shown in HISTORY classes when discussing the downfalls of long-lived empires (or nations). Maybe then we might get a little cold fear in our bellies, fear of ending up with a wrestler (or bodybuilder) President who can barely speak English. Or fear that the dimwit with ten kids in front of you in line at the grocery store is raising the Senators of tomorrow.

Mike Judge is a prophet. programme.desc:
Collateral Damage: Directed by Andrew Davis. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Francesca Neri, Elias Koteas, Cliff Curtis. After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0233469/","name":"Collateral Damage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIxYTA1YWUtODFiOS00NjY5LWIyOWQtYTFlYzMyNWI4MWM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0233469/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KissEnglishPasto"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hollywood Again Serves Up a Distorted & Grotesque Image of Colombia!","reviewBody":"From PASTO, COLOMBIA-Via: L. A. CA; CALI, COLOMBIA+ORLANDO, FL The ONLY Tony Kiss Castillo on FaceBook!---------------------------------

The Goveranator, "On the Loose, with Dr. Seuss!" As a Dual National, living in Colombia, people frequently come up to me and say: "I never go to those Hollywood movies, always projecting such a lousy image of Colombia!" Hard to refute that, eh! And how about this? Is it worth seeing AH-NULD one more time? Must answer much more "NO" than "YES"! Despite having seen a constant decline in the quality of his final films over the years they're still a cut above a lot of the action movies produced in Hollywood today.

If the ACTION genre is your thing: Maybe The answer is "YES". For everyone else, probably the words "I PASS" are the most apropos. "DAMAGE", filmed BEFORE 9/11, with its Colombian terrorists detonating bombs on U. S. soil, passes from the category of Fiction to that of Fairy Tale! The bad guy here is a narco-guerrilla/terrorist named Claudio Perini, willing to sacrifice it ALL for the "Cause". The most chilling aspect of this film, is a mother so perverse and diabolic, she sacrifices her only son, with the dispassionate air of someone taking out the trash!

Hollywood again serves up a distorted and grotesque image of Colombia. Seems like the ones experiencing the most "Collateral Damage" here are the viewers of the film itself!

5*.....ENJOY/DISFRUTELA??????

Any comments, questions or observations, in English o en Español, are most welcome!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73761,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-04-10","keywords":"outrunning explosion,woman murders a woman,murderess,firefighter,dream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Collateral Damage","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi482279705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDYwYjMwZDAtOTQwZC00YjZiLWFkYmYtNDdjNjliMzljYTVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDYwYjMwZDAtOTQwZC00YjZiLWFkYmYtNDdjNjliMzljYTVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0626202/","name":"Francesca Neri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001112/","name":"Andrew Davis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090310/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051510/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740462/","name":"Ronald Roose"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0341656/","name":"David Griffiths"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0341735/","name":"Peter Griffiths"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bone Collector
Sakupljač kostiju
programme.desc:
The Bone Collector: Directed by Phillip Noyce. With Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Queen Latifah, Michael Rooker. A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145681/","name":"The Bone Collector","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWQxN2ZmNDMtMzA2Ny00ZDJhLTlkNTgtMWMyZjljY2QzMzNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145681/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"denise_kate"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth a look! Both Jolie and Washington are on form","reviewBody":"I've read quite a few comments on this movie and some of them I disagree with and others I don't. Sure, it may be a little predictable and a bit 'all been done before' but there is a certain level of originality and uniqueness to it also.

For starters it has a fantastic cast and both lead actors (Jolie and Washington)have won Oscars and thats says something. It can't be easy playing a paralysed man and remaining so still and wooden and he plays the frustrations and emotions so realistically that I would imagine a person actually would be like in real life. Jolie is charming, composed and works well with the camera. Her character is convincing enough and this goes for her performance.The support cast is fantastic too, especially Queen Latifa.

The film may have the usual iconographic elements found in the psychological thriller genre but they are necessary for it to firstly conform and also progress. 'The Bone Collector' introduces new techniques and a slightly different angle for the viewer. there has to be a certain amount of repetition with this genre for it to work and this is the case for many others, such as romantic comedies and a couple falling in love or teen flicks with a football jock character.

I am currently writing my degree dissertation on sexual subjectivity in psychological thrillers and this film is perfect for that. The changing levels of gendered representations is very interesting and both supports and detracts away from the current representations in society.

I say, give it a go! Don't listen to people who have already seen it and didn't like it. If I'd have done that then I wouldn't have given it a go and my dissertation would have been short of argument!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161990,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-02-09","keywords":"criminal investigation,quadriplegic,new york city,copycat crime,paralysis","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bone Collector","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626617625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213281/","name":"Jeffery Deaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0406228/","name":"Jeremy Iacone"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Apollo 13
Apollo 13
programme.desc:
Apollo 13: Directed by Ron Howard. With Tom Hanks, Bill Paxton, Kevin Bacon, Gary Sinise. NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112384/","name":"Apollo 13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjEzYjJmNzgtNDkwNy00MTQ4LTlmMWMtNzA4YjE2NjI0ZDg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rammstein-2"},"dateCreated":"2000-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is really some movie","reviewBody":"I can watch this film over and over. Not only because I am so terribly interested in the exploration of space and the historical events that have taken place - but because it's a great film with excellent performances and a truth-telling style. Heck, even Lovell's wife dropping the wedding ring in the shower the day of the launch is true!

Just the fact that this film is true makes it even more enjoyable. It's hard to understand how in the hell one can make it back to Earth and survive with a fatally crippled space-craft. It's even harder to appreciate just how close they actually got to dying out there.

The performances are astounding. Ed Harris is just stupendous as Gene Krantz, and Tom Hanks, Kevin Bacon, Garty Sinise and Bill Paxton (who seems to always get the role as the whiner...) are also great.

As Hanks put it: this story is one of the greatest ever. The question is, how do you get home? That question is as old as humanity itself.

You can tell he put his heart and soul into this one. And the fact that this happened to the American space explorers is hardly noticeable. Good job.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":281639,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"1995-06-30","keywords":"1970s,survival,astronaut,space mission,rescue","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Apollo 13","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1605828889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZmZGY3YTMtZThkMS00NDQzLWJkYTUtYTRlOWUwYjlhM2U3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZmZGY3YTMtZThkMS00NDQzLWJkYTUtYTRlOWUwYjlhM2U3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522554/","name":"Jim Lovell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460200/","name":"Jeffrey Kluger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115310/","name":"William Broyles Jr."}],"duration":"PT2H20M"}</script><metacontent="

NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112384/","name":"Apollo 13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjEzYjJmNzgtNDkwNy00MTQ4LTlmMWMtNzA4YjE2NjI0ZDg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112384/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rammstein-2","dateCreated":"2000-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is really some movie","reviewBody":"I can watch this film over and over. Not only because I am so terribly interested in the exploration of space and the historical events that have taken place - but because it's a great film with excellent performances and a truth-telling style. Heck, even Lovell's wife dropping the wedding ring in the shower the day of the launch is true!

Just the fact that this film is true makes it even more enjoyable. It's hard to understand how in the hell one can make it back to Earth and survive with a fatally crippled space-craft. It's even harder to appreciate just how close they actually got to dying out there.

The performances are astounding. Ed Harris is just stupendous as Gene Krantz, and Tom Hanks, Kevin Bacon, Garty Sinise and Bill Paxton (who seems to always get the role as the whiner...) are also great.

As Hanks put it: this story is one of the greatest ever. The question is, how do you get home? That question is as old as humanity itself.

You can tell he put his heart and soul into this one. And the fact that this happened to the American space explorers is hardly noticeable. Good job.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":281639,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"1995-06-30","keywords":"1970s,survival,astronaut,space mission,rescue","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Apollo 13","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1605828889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZmZGY3YTMtZThkMS00NDQzLWJkYTUtYTRlOWUwYjlhM2U3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZmZGY3YTMtZThkMS00NDQzLWJkYTUtYTRlOWUwYjlhM2U3XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522554/","name":"Jim Lovell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460200/","name":"Jeffrey Kluger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115310/","name":"William Broyles Jr."],"duration":"PT2H20M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Equilibrium
Ekvilibrij
programme.desc:
Equilibrium: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Christian Bale, Dominic Purcell, Sean Bean, Christian Kahrmann. In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0238380/","name":"Equilibrium","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMzA1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUyMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0238380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Anonymous_Maxine"},"dateCreated":"2008-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":""Equilibrium" is really hard to type.","reviewBody":"I bought Equilibrium just because Christian Bale is in it. To tell you the truth I was certain that it was going to be a goofy, direct-to-video sci-fi fiasco that most involved would just as soon forget. The cover box reminded me of Universal Soldier. As it turns out however, it's not a movie that those involved want to forget, it's an overlooked gem, no doubt because it came at the height of the Matrix craze, which it may resemble in too many ways. Unfortunately, too many people will callously write it off as a Matrix rip-off, and it's a shame because this is one of the best science fiction films to have come along in quite some time. 

It takes place in the far off 21st century, but it's not about the future (given that it exists in a future that can't ever exist), it's about the disturbing reality that war is a part of human nature, and in order to eradicate it from the modern world we would have to become a homogenized society of emotionless, drug-controlled zombies. No jokes about that already being a reality.

The movie's biggest assertion is that it assigns blame for man's inhumanity to man to his ability to feel (ignoring the real causes, such as religion, political power, and less dogmatic things like national pride and human rights). The current government is based on enforcing the mass removal of emotion from the masses using a drug called Prozium, and is the source of the movie's main irony, that in order to eradicate war, it has waged war on all of it's own citizens, who constantly live under close surveillance. 

The government employs Grammaton Clerics to handle that surveillance. They are highly trained officers authorized to kill anyone they deem to be "sense offenders" on the spot ("I trust you'll be more vigilant in the future?"). There is, in fact, a staggering amount of irony in the film, given that all emotion or feeling is strictly forbidden under penalty of death, and yet anger, suspicion and fear are all alive and well, and even flaunted. It's also interesting to consider that in real life it is the dogmatic, Cleric-like believers who aspire for war, and the normal people who just want to live their lives. 

For the most part the movie ignores the fact that it is governments that wage war, not citizens (even emotionally sensitive ones), but no matter. The important thing that you need to know about the movie is that it goes way, way too far, and because of that, it's fun. I cheered out loud several times during the film because the gun fights, which are so unrealistic it's almost funny, are genuinely well-choreographed and exciting. If I may say so, this is what gun fights in hard core science fiction movies should look like.

Many people criticize the movie for being unrealistic or too extreme, altogether forgetting what kind of movie they're watching in the first place. The movie is not about moral dilemmas, even though the main character suffers a tremendous one, it's a fast, gritty science fiction movie that makes no apologies, and owes none. The characterization may be just a little heavy (Bale's character going from not understanding a question about what he felt when his wife was incinerated to having a soft spot for puppies, etc.), but like another outstanding and equally over-the-top film, Shoot 'Em Up, nothing is out of place. All of the excesses look right at home. 

It is interesting to consider the real-world implications of the content of the movie though, regardless of how unrealistic it is. The totalitarian regime, for example, resembles Mao Tse- tung's manner of oppression with startling closeness, even down to the children spying on and reporting their parents. Under Mao, children who reported their parents engaging in "counter'-revolutionary activities" were publicly hailed as national heroes while their parents were generally tortured and executed. Whether the crimes were real or not was unimportant, what mattered is that, as you can imagine, in a society where people were so easily made to desperately fear their own children, you can imagine the level of control the government (Mao) had over the people. Something similar happens in this movie.

The similarities to The Matrix films are obvious, but limited mostly to superficial things like the fight scenes and some costumes. Thematically, the movies are totally different, and even with all of the similarities, this movie is more than able to stand on its own, and any similarities are more just an unfortunate bit of timing, as this is probably what caused the movie to be so overlooked. If you can't handle a little excess in the movies, definitely stay away from this one. But if you can watch a movie just for a good time, you could do a lot worse than this.

Note: Keep your eye out for Dominic Purcell, Prison Break's Lincoln Burrows, in the opening scene. He should have had a bigger role in the movie...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":318968,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2005-01-12","keywords":"dystopia,suppression of emotion,gun fu,law,brainwashing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Equilibrium","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi368025113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NmRmYzUtYzM3MS00OWU0LTgzYmMtNzc2OTFkZGZhMzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NmRmYzUtYzM3MS00OWU0LTgzYmMtNzc2OTFkZGZhMzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000293/","name":"Sean Bean"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001833/","name":"Emily Watson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007610/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Norbit
Norbit
programme.desc:
Norbit: Directed by Brian Robbins. With Eddie Murphy, Thandiwe Newton, Terry Crews, Clifton Powell. A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0477051/","name":"Norbit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI4NDE4MjgyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQwODc0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0477051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maestro-20"},"dateCreated":"2007-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not his best, but not his worst either","reviewBody":"Yes, the movie is racist and politically incorrect, but you know what? I think many people are offended because they miss the point. Brian Robbins and Eddie Murphy would be stupid to make a racist movie -- instead, they are making fun of it. Anyone who has seen a South Park episode would understand "satire" instead of calling it racist, homophobic, or whatever. I think that's what Eddie Murphy was trying to do here -- to poke fun at our own prejudices.

As a film, Norbit only succeeds halfway. It has some hilarious moments, but the film is unfocused and inconsistent. The script is bad, but I guess if you're used to comedies like Epic Movies, you'll be okay with bad comedy scripts. The stereotypes are so blatant and obvious that they are funny. When Mr. Wong (Murphy) said, "Of course I am racist!" he had a point. In a way, we are all prejudiced; we just don't want to admit to it.

Judging from the reaction of a packed theater on a Sunday night (blacks, whites, Asians, men, women, thin people, overweight people), I think people can have a good time with this one if they put aside their political correctness. It's just another crude, raunchy, silly comedy. And Eddie Murphy is funny as hell.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71983,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-03-21","keywords":"character name as title,man wears eyeglasses,woman hits a man,paramount,splash","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Norbit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi228196633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTdiY2JmMzktOTkzZi00YWE2LWFhYjgtMWYyZWI0ZDBlZDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTdiY2JmMzktOTkzZi00YWE2LWFhYjgtMWYyZWI0ZDBlZDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0628601/","name":"Thandiwe Newton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0187719/","name":"Terry Crews"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005367/","name":"Brian Robbins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099647/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614151/","name":"Charlie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771065/","name":"Jay Scherick"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Vanilla Sky: Directed by Cameron Crowe. With Tom Cruise, Penélope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell. A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0259711/","name":"Vanilla Sky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzFlMTJjYzUtMWFjYy00NjkyLTg1Y2EtYmZkMjdlOGQ1ZGYwL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0259711/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jensenj49"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"I still say It's the Vanilla Sky at sunset these days","reviewBody":"This movie was so divisive. People either loved it or despised it. You can either accept the ending or you can't. The movie really makes you think and wonder, "what's going on?" You are not always supposed to know what is going on. A lot of people do not want to have to think too much lol. Great movie, good soundtrack. I love rarely when movies change the way you listen to a song. Good Vibrations by the Beach Boys came across in the moment as so eerie, I still think of that now when i hear it. programme.title: The Bank Job
Pljačka
programme.desc: The Bank Job: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Jason Statham, Saffron Burrows, Stephen Campbell Moore, Daniel Mays. Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0200465/","name":"The Bank Job","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmE2NzEyOWItYjI1ZC00YWZhLWI2MjEtZmU1NjIyNjliOTkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0200465/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jkeggen"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very good British Film","reviewBody":"I also saw this film at an advance screening. I don't normally watch any of the trailers before going, so tend to go in with an open mind. I was very pleasantly surprised, and while it perhaps won't win any Oscars, I thought it was well acted in the main with some faces you'll recognise. It might not have massive appeal outside the UK, however it is a good (based on fact) story. I'm not a massive fan of 70's music, but it wouldn't have done any harm to have a bit more in the background just to give it more of a seventies feel about it. The general mood of the film was good and for me seemed to set the scene well, without going overboard with sex or violence. On the whole, it's well worth a visit, even if you have never lived in that era.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177819,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-01-28","keywords":"safe deposit,heist,chase,mobster,london england","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004787/","name":"Saffron Burrows"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1304386/","name":"Stephen Campbell Moore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037759/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166074/","name":"Dick Clement"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0478588/","name":"Ian La Frenais"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0200465/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jkeggen","dateCreated":"2008-02-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very good British Film","reviewBody":"I also saw this film at an advance screening. I don't normally watch any of the trailers before going, so tend to go in with an open mind. programme.title: Mbreti Pagan
programme.desc: Në shtratin e vdekjes, mbreti i kalon pushtetin e tij një trashëgimtari të pazakontë, i cili duhet të gjejë forcën brenda vetes për të bashkuar popullin kundër kryqëzatave që kërcënojnë lirinë e tyre.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Zemërdragoi
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid, Sean Connery. Dragoi i fundit në botë dhe një gjuetar dragonjsh, duhet të bëhen bashkë për të luftuar një mbret të pashpirt që thuajse ia ka arritur të bëhet i pavdekshëm.
programme.category: Aventurë
fantazi

programme.title: Hanxhari 2
programme.desc: D.Trejo. Ish agjenti meksikan Hanxhari, rekrutohet nga presidenti i SHBA, për një mision te ri. Ai duhet të përballet me një revolucionar të çmendur dhe një tregtar armësh miliarder, që ka thurur një plan për të përhapur luftën në botë...
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantazi

programme.title: Ndjekja
programme.desc: Benicio Del Toro, Tommy Lee Jones. I përndjekur nga makthet e përjetuara në Kosovë, nga agjent i forcave speciale, Ajron Hellem është kthyer në kriminel në arrati dhe pas i është vënë njohësi më i mirë i teknikave të tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Prapa vijës së armikut
programme.desc: 2001. G.Hackman. Një pilot i Flotës Ushtarake Detare qëllohet në territorin e armikut dhe ndiqet pa mëshirë nga një agjent sekret i policisë dhe trupat armike. Ndërkohë komandanti i tij në kundërshtim me urdhërat niset për ta shpëtuar.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: I infiltruari
programme.desc: 2005 H.Bonneville. Një dedektiv i ri në moshë, në mision të fshehtë, do të hyjë në radhet e elitës së një shkolle private. Një nxënës është vrarë. Vrasësi bredh i lirë. Ajo që do të zbuloje dedektivi Tracy Tre është një komplot vrastar i paimagjinues.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Qitësi 1
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes. Një ushtarak i forcave speciale Amerikane duhet të neutralizojë një reaktor bërthamor çeçen përpara se të bjerë në duart e terroristëve. Përpjekje për jetë a vdekje. ankth dhe tmerr i pafund!
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Mbreti i Skocisë
programme.desc: I rrahur dhe i përndjekur nga mbështetësi e Kurorës Britanike, Mbreti i Skocisë strehohet nga një familje e thjeshtë, ku gjen vendosmërinë për të mbledhur popullin e tij dhe për ta udhëhequr të luftojë për pavarësi.
programme.category: Aksion
histori

programme.title: Mirë se erdhët në xhungël
programme.desc: The Rock, S.William Scott, C.Walken. Një gjuetar shpërblimesh i pamëshirshëm do të pajtohet për të kthyer në shtëpi djalin e një mafiozi, i cili ndodhet në pyjet e Amazonës në kërkim të një thesari të fshehur.
programme.category: Aksion
aventure

programme.title: Në kërkim të identitetit
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. Një burrë zgjohet në Vietnam pa asnjë kujtesë se kush është ose nga vjen. Ndërsa endet nëpër qytet për të gjetur të dhëna nga e kaluara e tij, ai përndiqet nga disa personazhe misteriozë dhe të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Etje për hakmarrje
programme.desc: 2019. Frank Grillo. Me shumë mundim, Nik ndërtoi një jetë të re dhe besonte se kishte shpëtuar nga e kaluara e tij kriminale. Por kur shoku i vjetër i vret gruan, ai detyrohet t'i kthehet jetës së dëshpëruar dhe të dhunshme që ai mendoi se e la pas.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë

programme.title: Doktori i Çuditshëm
programme.desc: 2016. Benedict Cumberbatch, Tilda Swinton Një neurokirurg i njohur në kërkim të një kure, gjen magjinë në një vend misterioz të njohur si Kamar Tazh - vija e frontit për luftën midis forcave të errëta që po shkatërrojnë realitetin tonë.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantazi

programme.title: Piratët e Karaibeve 3
programme.desc: Regjia: Gore Verinski. Aktorët: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightely. Ndërkohë që anija fantazmë po bën kërdinë në 'Shtatë Detet', Uill, Elisabet dhe Barbosa, përpiqen të shpëtojnë Xhek Sperroun, nga burgosja e Devi Xhonsit...
programme.category: Action Superheroes

programme.title: Lëvizja jote
programme.desc: Një vrasës me pagesë i tërhequr nga profesioni, detyrohet të lërë jetën e qetë dhe të rizgjojë të gjitha aftësitë e tij vrasëse, kur një bos i drogës merr peng mbesën e tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: Regjia: Tony Scott; Aktorët: Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke, Edgar Ramirez. E zgjuar, rebele dhe e bukur; kjo është historia e vërtetë e Domino Harvit, vajzës së rritur mes luksit dhe privilegjeve që lë gjithçka për t'u bërë gjahtare shpërblimesh.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lufta e yjeve IV
programme.desc: Kaloresit Xhedaj qe kane mbetur pa u shfarosur do te luftojne per te rimarre galaktiken e tyre me ne krye princeshen Leia e cila do te kete nje kundershtar shume te forte, gangasterin me te pashpirt te te gjitha galaktikave, Jaba The Hat.
programme.category: Nje shprese e re

programme.title: Gracka kohore
programme.desc: 2017. Një grup studentësh bllokohen në një shpellë misterioze ndërsa kërkojnë profesorin e zhdukur të arkeologjisë. Edhe pse pa asnjë shpresë shpëtimi, përpjeka për një rrugëdalje, i çon ata të zbulojnë legjendën më të lakmuar në histori...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Rrëmbimi
programme.desc: 1998. Mark Wahlberg. Per nje grusht para me shume, nje bande vrasesish me pagese, pa qene ne dijeni rrembejne nje vajze te ciles vete bosi i tyre i ish bere kumbare. Nga ky çast aventurat dhe te papriturat per ta s'do te rreshtin.
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: I pandalshmi
programme.desc: Don Lee. Pasi një bandë famëkeqe kriminale rrëmben bashkëshorten e tij, një gangster legjendar në pension detyrohet të rikthehet në kriminelin e pandalshëm që ishte dikur për ta shpëtuar.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kur nata na mbuloi
programme.desc: Anthony Mackie, Kerry Washington. Amerikë, vitet 70. Pas shumë vitesh, një ish anëtar i organizatës politike afro-amerikane "Panterat e zeza" kthehet në lagjen e vjetër, ku përjeton të njëjtat rivalitete dhe lidhje dashurore që la pas.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Pafundësisht Ari Polar
programme.desc: 2014. Mark Ruffalo, Zoe Saldana. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë. Një njeri që vuan nga çrregullimi bipolar, përpiqet të rifitojë zemrën e gruas duke marrë përsipër që të kujdeset për dy vajzat e tyre, ndërkohë që ajo ndodhet në një qytet tjetër.
programme.category: Drame
komedi

programme.title: Dhoma e gazit
programme.desc: Chris O'Donnell, Gene Hackman. Një avokat i ri idealist merr në ngarkim çështjen e një vrasësi të dënuar me vdekje, i cili kishte hedhur në erë një ndërtesë duke shkaktuar viktima të pafajshme.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Kur gjithçka ndryshon
programme.desc: Bette Midler, Colin Firth, Matthew Broderick. Helen Hunt vjen si regjisore në filmin bazuar në romanin Bestseller të Elinor Lipman. Një grua moderne përballë një krize moderne të moshës së mesme.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Sprova e familjes
programme.desc: Dermot Mulroney, Sarah Jessica Parker, Claire Danes. Një grua e suksesshme në biznes dhe serioze, shkon për vizitë në shtëpinë e të dashurit të saj, por që në momentin e parë duket qartë se diferencat janë shumë të mëdha.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Nuk flas më
programme.desc: James Gandolfini, Julia Louis-Dreyfus. Një nënë e divorcuar fillon një romancë me një burrë gjithashtu të divorcuar. Por kur zbulon si ai është ish-burri i mikes së saj të re, fillojnë dhe dilemat e përshtypjeve të para dhe mundësive të dyta.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Dy martesa dhe një keqkuptim
programme.desc: Tia Mowry, Tamera Mowry. Një keqkuptim i madh do të krijohet kur dy motra binjake, pa e kuptuar fillojnë të shoqërohen me të njëjtin njeri dhe e ftojnë në të njëjtën ditë për vizitë në shtëpinë e prindërve...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Dashuria ime... mallkimi im
programme.desc: Në Londrën e viteve 1930, një grua (Helena Bonham Carter) bie në dashuri me burrin (Paul Bettany) e së motrës (Olivia Williams), duke filluar kështu një sagë mashtrimi, pasioni dhe rivaliteti që do të sjellë pasoja të pakthyeshme.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Papa- Hemingueji në Kubë
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Në vitin 1959, një gazetar i ri shkon në Kubë për të takuar idhullin e tij, Ernest Heminguejin. Heminguej e mëson të riun të peshkojë, të festojë dhe të gjejë zërin e tij letrar, ndërsa Revolucioni Kuban vlon përreth.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: Antuan Fisher
programme.desc: Një psikiatër (Denzel Washington) frymëzon një marins të trazuar nga abuzimet e prindërve birësues, të kërkojë nënën e tij të vërtetë.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Kartolina të pikturuara
programme.desc: Një ish-aktore Hollivudi rikthehet në qytezën e lindjes për t'i thënë lamtumirën nënës që po vdes, por përfundon duke u kujdesur për një motër që nuk e dinte që e kishte dhe duke u përballur me të kaluarën që u përpoq ta linte pas.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Magjia e shtrigës së mirë
programme.desc: Cassie Nightingale është një shtrigë që përdor fuqitë e saj për të ndihmuar të tjerët. Ndërsa planifikon një dasmë familjare, ajo mirëpret një grua misterioze që endet në qytet. Ardhja e saj përkon me një sërë sfidash me të cilat, Cassie dhe i gjithë qyte.
programme.category: Dramë
fantazi

programme.title: Zënka mes femrash
programme.desc: Sandra Oh, Anne Heche, Alicia Silverstone. Dy ish mikesha kolegji, jetët e të cilave nuk shkuan siç ato kishin shpresuar, takohen rastësisht pas dekadash. Ndërsa dy gratë afrohen përsëri, armiqësitë e varrosura prej kohësh dhe xhelozia e vjetër shpërthejn.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Kalëruesi i dallgëve
programme.desc: Gerard Butler, Jonny Weston. Historia e 15 vjeçarit Xhei Moriariti që kërkon ndihmën një serfisti legjendar për të kaluar dallgën më të famshme të oqeaneve, Maveriks...
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Devdas
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2002. Shahrukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai. Ngjarjet zhvillohen në Indinë e viteve 1900 dhe portretizojnë dashurinë a pakrahasueshme të dy të rinjve, të cilët u ndanë për shkak të diferencave në klasën shoqërore.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Seth Rogen. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të një djali 27-vjecar, i cili diagnostikohet me kancer të avancuar dhe e luftës se tij për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Biorafi
dramë

programme.title: Dora e fundit
programme.desc: Famke Janssen. Një grua që përpiqet t'i shpëtojë të kaluarës dhe ish-burrit të saj, thur një komplot të rrezikshëm dhe detyrohet që të rrezikojë gjithçka në një lojë të fundit bastesh.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Faji Shkruar në Yje
programme.desc: 2014. Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort. Dy adoleshentë, të dy me sindroma të ndryshme kanceri, bien në dashuri me njëri tjetrin pasi takohen në një grup që mbështet të sëmurët me kancer.
programme.category: Drame
romance

programme.title: E vërteta...ai s'të ka qejf
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Aniston, Drew Barrymore. Një film mbi dashurinë dhe jetën në çift, mbi tentativat për të lexuar dhe zbërthyer sjelljet dhe marrëdhëniet njerëzore.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Pasoja
programme.desc: Keira Knightley, Alexander Skarsgard. Gjermania e pasluftës,1946. Kur Rasheli arrin në Hamburg pas luftës, ajo trishtohet nga shkatërrimi që sheh. Gjërat komplikohen kur ajo duhet të ndajë shtëpinë e saj me Stefan, një gjerman i ve dhe vajzën e tij.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Antebellum
programme.desc: Janelle Monáe. Një thriller provokues nga producentët e suksesshëm të 'Get out'. Shkrimtarja e njohur afro-amerikane, Veronika Henlei e gjen veten të zhytur në një realitet të tmerrshëm, i cili e detyron të përballet me të kaluarën, të tashmen dhe të ardh.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: Pas Cak
programme.desc: Ndiqni xhirimet e prapaskenave te filmit.
programme.category: Rambo 4

programme.title: Thirrja e përbindëshit
programme.desc: Lewis MacDougall, Sigourney Weaver. 12 vjeçari Konor, i cili po përballet me sëmundjen e nënës, një gjyshe të ashpër dhe moshatarë që e tallin, gjen aleatin më të pazakontë kur në dritaren e tij shfaqet një përbindësh.
programme.category: Fantazi
dramë

programme.title: Vrite Babagjyshin
programme.desc: Mel Gibson. Këtë vit Santa Klaus e gjen veten në një betejë vdekjeprurëse me një vrasës, që është punësuar nga një 12-vjeçar i xhindosur, i cili po hakmerret sepse në çorapen e tij të Krishtlindjes gjeti një copë qymyri...
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: Klubi i Djemve Miliarderë
programme.desc: Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Një grup të rinjsh në gjendje në Amerikën e viteve '80 ndërtojnë një plan se si të bëjnë para të shpejta, me anë të një skeme piramidale, e cila përfundon të bëhet vdekjeprurëse...
programme.category: Biografi
krim
dramë

programme.title: Dhuntia e errët
programme.desc: Amandla Stenberg, Mandy Moore. Pasi adoleshentët me fuqi misterioze ndalohen nga qeveria, Rubi, një nga më të fuqishmet, arratiset dhe bashkohet me një grup të larguarish, në një rezistencë për të marrë në dorë e fatit të tyre...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Gundala
programme.desc: Bazuar në personazhin e shquar të librave komikë indonezianë. Kur lakmia dhe dhuna arrijnë një pikë të padurueshme në Xhakarta, jetimi i kthyer në superhero, Sancaka bëhet shpresa e vetme e njerëzve për paqe.

aventurë

programme.title: Fantastikët 2
programme.desc: Nominuar për çmim "Oskar". Familja e preferuar e superheronjëve rikthehet! Këtë herë Helena punon për të shpëtuar botën, ndërsa Bobit i mbetet të kujdeset për shtëpinë dhe fëmijët, tek zbulon heroizmat e jetës së përditshme.

programme.title: Ivani i madhërishëm
programme.desc: Bazuar në librin e vlerësuar për fëmijë me të njëjtin titull. Një gorillë me emrin Ivan përpiqet të kujtojë të kaluarën e tij me ndihmën e një elefanti me emrin Stela, ndërkohë që ata krijojnë një plan për të shpëtuar nga robëria.
programme.category: Fantazi

programme.title: Një familje e madhe
programme.desc: Një film nga Gabriele Muccino. Me një kast i mrekullueshëm aktorësh si Stefano Accorsi, Pierfrancesco Favino etj. Të detyruar të qëndrojnë sëbashku për disa ditë, një familje e madhe do të përballet me krisjet, nën sipërfaqen e lumtur .
programme.category: Komedi
drame

programme.title: Djali im i bukur
programme.desc: 2018. Steve Carell, Timothée Chalamet. Bazuar në bestsellerat me kujtime të babë e bir, David dhe Nic Sheff. Historia e trishtë dhe frymëzuese e një familjeje e cila lufton për vite me rradhe kundër varësise ndaj drogës të djalit të tyre.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Ata që mbeten gjallë
programme.desc: Një i ri i vetmuar, i fiksuar pas video lojërave, përballet me botën reale kur kupton se diçka nuk shkon jashtë apartamentit të tij. Një virus i tmerrshëm shndërron njerëzit në zombie dhe qyteti izolohet duke ndërprerë të gjitha mënyrat e komunikimit.

programme.title: Një vajze e mirë si ty
programme.desc: Pas braktiset nga i dashuri i saj për mungesë të intimitetit, një violiniste krijon një listë të guximshme të gjërave që duhet të eksperimetojë në lidhje me seksin dhe nis një udhëtim të rrëmbyeshëm vetëzbulimi.

programme.title: Pasagjerët

programme.title: Një fundjavë pa internet
programme.desc: 2018. Fabrizio Bentivoglio. Një shkrimtar me emër dhe armik publik i internetit, me rastin e ditëlindjes mbledh familjen në shtëpinë e tij në mal. Kur grupi mbetet befasisht pa linjë interneti, të gjithë i kap paniku dhe pasojat do te jenë të paparas.

programme.title: Vrasjet e kartolinave
programme.desc: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Famke Janssen. Një detektiv njujorkez heton vdekjen brutale të vajzës dhe dhëndrit të tij në Londër. Kur mëson se çifte të tjera në Europë patën të njëjtin fat me ta, ai garon me kohën për të ndalur vrasjet.

fantashkencë

programme.title: Kushtrimi i të parëve
programme.desc: Bazuar në klasikun e dashur të Xhek Londonit. Gjatë etheve të arit të viteve 1890, një qen me zemër të madhe, i quajtur Bak, rrëmbehet nga shtëpia e tij në Kaliforni dhe dërgohet në Alaskë, ku nis aventurat e mbijetesës në egërsinë e Arktikut.
programme.category: Aventurë
familje

programme.title: Në një lagje të Nju Jorkut
programme.desc: Anthony Ramos. Usnavi, djali i dy emigrantëve Domenikanë në Nju Jork, është në dilemë: të mbyll dyqanin që zotëron dhe të rikthehet në Republikën Domenikane për të hapur një lokal buzë detit apo të qëndrojë në Nju Jork.
programme.category: Dramë
musikal
romancë

programme.title: Aventurë në galaktikë
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Tony Shalhoub. Parodi e sagës "Startrek". Disa aktorë që vite më parë ishin pjesë e një serial fantastiko-shkencor, duhet të ndihmojnë një racë jashtëtokësorësh, që mendojnë se ata janë heronj të vërtetë.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Erdhi cirku
programme.desc: Tre komedianët e njohur italianë, në skenë me një seri skeçesh, me batuta e role si; murgj, kirgurgë të paaftë, policë të forcave speciale, barabarë, magjistarë, aventurierë e parodi të disa filmave të njohur amerikanë...
programme.category: Aldo
Giovanni & Giacomo

programme.title: Dasmë në Long Ajlënd
programme.desc: 2018. Adam Sandler, Chris Rock. Dy baballarë me karaktere të ndryshëm dhe pikëpamje krejt të kundërta për organizimin e dasmës së fëmijëve të tyre, pëpiqen të ruajnë gjakftohtësinë gjatë javës kaotike përpara ditës së madhe...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Togeri Bilko
programme.desc: Steve Martin. Togeri Bilko është përgjegjësi i një baze ushtarake, ku mundësitë e argëtimit s'mungojnë. Kur një armik i vjetër vjen për kontroll, ai do të shpalosë gjithë aftësitë e tij për të sabotuar etjen e tjetrit për hakmarje.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: I pasuri, i varfri dhe maxhordomi
programme.desc: Filmi i fundit i Aldo, Xhovani e Xhakomos. Një ditë të bukur, Xhakomo, nje pasanik i regjur, humb gjithcka. Me ndihmën e maxhordomit të tij dhe një shitësi ambulant të cilin e përplas me makinë, ai do arrijë të gjej një zgjidhje.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Po ky nga doli?
programme.desc: Kur Tereza e fton Simonin, te fejuarin e saj, ne festen e 25-vjetorit te marteses se prinderve, kishte harruar t'u thoshte që ai ishte i bardhe. I bindur per ta prishur kete fejese, baba Xhoni, do beje gjithçka qe Simoni te ndjehet si dele e zeze.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Shpikja e gënjeshtrës
programme.desc: Ricky Gervais, Jennifer Garner, Jonah Hill. Në një botë ku të gjithë thonë vetëm të vërtetën, një shkrimtar i dështuar do të ndryshojë fatin e tij duke shpikur gënjeshtrën dhe duke e përdorur atë për të arritur gjithçka që do...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Garë e çmendur
programme.desc: Nje klient i rregullt kazinosh ne Las Vegas, i vendosur per te gjetur nje menyre te re per te vene baste, organizon nje gare me para.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Në luftë për dashurinë
programme.desc: Nju Jork, 1943. Arturo duhet të kthehet në atdhe për të ndaluar që e dashura e tij të martohet me djalin e një bosi mafie. Ndaj, ai bashkohet me radhët e ushtrisë amerikane, e cila po përgatitet të zbarkojë në Siçili...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Natë në muze
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Robin Williams. Një baba i përkushtuar përpiqet me çdo kusht të gjejë një punë të rregullt dhe perfundon si roje në muzeumin e trashëgimisë kulturore ku natën gjithçka kthehet në një realitet të jashtëzakonshëm.
programme.category: Komedi
fantazi

programme.title: Thjesht... e ndërlikuar
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin, Steve Martin. Një grua bie në dashuri me ish burrin e saj tashmë të martuar me dikë tjetër, ndërkohë që një arkitekt, bie në dashuri me të. Duket histori konfuze, por është thjesht... e ndërlikuar!
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Hanibal, Zanafilla e së keqes
programme.desc: Gaspard Ulliel. Viti i prodhimit: 2008. Pas vdekjes së prindërve të tij gjatë luftës së dytë botërore, Hanibal Lektor i mbushur nga dëshira për t'u hakmarrë, u shndërrua në një vrasës të njohur serial.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Shpella e fundit
programme.desc: Richard Roxburgh, Ioan Gruffudd, Rhys Wakefield. Një grup eksploratorësh në shpellën më të madhe në botë, bllokohen brenda saj nga një stuhi e fuqishme. Tani për të dalë gjallë, ata përballen me vështirësi të paimagjinueshme.
programme.category: Aventurë/Thriller

programme.title: Orët vendimtare
programme.desc: 2013. Paul Walker, Genesis Rodriguez. Pasi uragani Katrina shkatërron shumicën e Luizianës, një njeri mbetet i vetëm në spital me vajzën e sapolindur dhe me çdo orë vendimtare që kalon, bën të pamundurën që ajo të mbijetojë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Telefonata e inspektorit
programme.desc: Një inspektor misterioz mbërrin në pronën e familjes se pasur Birling, pak para se ata të nisin një festë luksoze. Ai sjell lajmin e vetvrasjes së një gruaje të re dhe ka disa pyetje për të gjithë familjarët...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Gjahtarja demon
programme.desc: Në Kinën e lashtë, gjatë periudhës së dinastisë Han, një gjeneral shpëton një vazjë të re, pa e ditur se ajo është një demon që ushqehet me zemrat e njerëzve.
programme.category: Thriller
fantazi

programme.title: Nën hijen e frikës
programme.desc: 2016. Gjatë luftës Iran - Irak, një grua nga Teharani e cila kujdeset për të bijën ndërsa bashkëshorti ndodhet në luftë, bindet gradualisht se një shpirt i lig po pushton shtëpinë e saj.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Lojë me shpirtrat
programme.desc: Një grup miqsh, duhet të përballen me tmerrin e tyre më të madh, kur gjatë një përpjekje për të kontaktuar me një shoqen e tyre të vdekur, zgjojnë një të keqe të paimagjinueshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Dëshmitarja e rremë
programme.desc: Një ngjarje tronditëse lë pasoja në mendjen e një dëshmitareje, që reflektohet edhe në dëshminë e saj në gjyq. E dëshpëruar për ndihmë, ajo i drejtohet një psikologu jotradicional, i cili është vetë i konsumuar nga ngjarjet e të kaluarës...
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: E ftohtë vjen nata
programme.desc: Alice Eve, Bryan Cranston. Një pronare hoteli dhe vajza e saj merren peng nga një kriminel thuajse i verbër, për ta ndihmuar që ai të rimarrë paratë e tij, të vjedhura bashkë me një polic të korruptuar...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Mamaja
programme.desc: Anabel (Jessica Chastain) përpiqet të integrojë në një jetë normale, 2 mbesat e të dashurit të saj, te cilat ishin zhdukur për 5 vjet, në një pyll... Por sa më shumë kalon koha, aq më shumë ajo kupton, se ato nuk janë të vetme...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Aktivitet paranormal 6
programme.desc: Chris J. Murray, Brit Shaw. Duke përdorur një kamera që mund të shohë shpirtrat, një familje bën të pamundurën për të mbrojtur vajzën e tyre nga një forcë djallëzore me një plan të tmerrshëm...
programme.category: Dimensioni i fantazmës

programme.title: Arsenali
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack. Lidhja mes dy vëllezëve që kanë marrë drejtime të kundërta në jetë, sprovohet kur një bos krimi merr peng njërin prej tyre dhe kërkon para nga vëllai tjetër, një biznesmen i suksesshëm që do të heqë dorë nga të gjitha parimet e.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Instinkti vrasës
programme.desc: Nikolas Cage. Një gjahtar i zoti që po transporton kafshë të rralla dhe të rrezikshme me anije, duhet të përdorë të gjithë aftësitë e tij për të kapur një tjetër krijesë vdekjeprurëse, një të burgosur të dhunshëm që endet i lirë në bord.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Shtatë ditë
programme.desc: Kur e bija 8-vjeçare përdhunohet dhe vritet, një mjek kirurg planifikon imtësisht hakmarrjen. Ditën që vrasësi paraqitet në gjykatë, ai e rrëmben dhe njofton policinë se do ta mbajë dhunuesin e të bijës 7 ditë, e më pas do të dorëzohet.
programme.category: Horror

Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5463162/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Honest review of all 3 versions","reviewBody":"It's true that you can have too much of a good thing...please no more different editions!

THEATRICAL CUT - was the best version of any of the "cuts" it was the most cleanly edited and it had the best soundtrack out of the three. It is clear after seeing all the versions of the film that they tested all of the jokes and the ones included were cherry picked, and the best were picked to be included in this one.

SUPER DUPER CUT/EXTENDED - this was supposed to be an extended version of the film but it was actually a different cut...what I mean by that is that they changed the soundtrack and they cut out what I considered to be some of the funniest jokes from the theatrical cut and replaced them. They ALSO added some additional footage to the film after making those changes. This version of the film feels darker and less funny to me personally so I prefer the theatrical cut over it.

ONCE UPON A DEADPOOL/PG13 - This is the edition that nobody asked for and is the most unnecessary. From an editing standpoint this version of film is very sloppy, and seems like one giant montage. They don't even start this version of the film out at the beginning it jumps right into the "safe room scene". A lot of the footage included in this edition was already available on the home releases and online (apart from the short amount filmed with Fred Savage). The movie would end up edited on TV regardless of this edition existing or not. So in reality there was no need for this edition to exist apart from making more money.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":521716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2018-05-18","keywords":"anti hero,japanese girl,based on comic book,marvel comics,superhero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984557081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Deadpool 2' is heading back to theaters for 12 days from Dec. 12, 2018, re-cut for a PG-13 audience. In new scenes, Fred Savage will be seen alongside Deadpool, in an homage to Savage's starring role in the 'The Princess Bride.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000982/","name":"Josh Brolin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500610/","name":"David Leitch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="
